file.name: user-rating.yaml
file.content:
# Copyright 2021, Andrew Lindesay
# Distributed under the terms of the MIT License.

openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: HDS User Rating API
  version: "2.0"
  description: >
    This API interface covers all aspects of user ratings of packages.
tags:
  - name: user-rating
paths:


  /__api/v2/user-rating/update-user-rating:
    description: >
      This method will update the user rating.  The user rating is identified by the supplied code and the
      supplied filter describes those properties of the user rating that should be updated.
    post:
      tags:
        - user-rating
      operationId: updateUserRating
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/updateUserRatingRequestEnvelope"
      responses:
        200:
          description: >
            Result of having update the user rating; essentially empty
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/updateUserRatingResponseEnvelope"


  /__api/v2/user-rating/create-user-rating:
    description: >
      This method will create a user rating based on the data provided.  In the result is a code that
      identifies this rating.
    post:
      tags:
        - user-rating
      operationId: createUserRating
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/createUserRatingRequestEnvelope"
      responses:
        200:
          description: >
            Result of having created the user rating.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/createUserRatingResponseEnvelope"



  /__api/v2/user-rating/get-user-rating-by-user-and-pkg-version:
    description: >
      This will find the user rating identified by the user and the package version.  If
      not such user rating exists then this method will return a not-found response.
      Note that there is no authorization on it; it is effectively public.
    post:
      tags:
        - user-rating
      operationId: getUserRatingByUserAndPkgVersion
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/getUserRatingByUserAndPkgVersionRequestEnvelope"
      responses:
        200:
          description: >
            The user rating.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/getUserRatingByUserAndPkgVersionResponseEnvelope"


  /__api/v2/user-rating/search-user-ratings:
    description: >
      This method will return user rating search results based on the
      criteria supplied in the request.
    post:
      tags:
        - user-rating
      operationId: searchUserRatings
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/searchUserRatingsRequestEnvelope"
      responses:
        200:
          description: >
            The search results.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/searchUserRatingsResponseEnvelope"


components:
  schemas:


    updateUserRatingRequestEnvelope:
      type: object
      properties:
        code:
          type: string
        active:
          type: boolean
        naturalLanguageCode:
          type: string
        userRatingStabilityCode:
          type: string
        comment:
          type: string
        rating:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        filter:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
            enum:
              - ACTIVE
              - NATURALLANGUAGE
              - USERRATINGSTABILITY
              - COMMENT
              - RATING
    updateUserRatingResponseEnvelope:
      type: object
      properties:
        result:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/updateUserRatingResult"
        error:
          $ref: "./error.yaml#/components/schemas/error"
    updateUserRatingResult:
      type: object


    createUserRatingRequestEnvelope:
      type: object
      properties:
        repositoryCode:
          type: string
          description: deprecated; use the repositorySourceCode instead
        repositorySourceCode:
          type: string
        naturalLanguageCode:
          type: string
        userNickname:
          type: string
        userRatingStabilityCode:
          type: string
        comment:
          type: string
        rating:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        pkgName:
          type: string
        pkgVersionArchitectureCode:
          type: string
        pkgVersionMajor:
          type: string
        pkgVersionMinor:
          type: string
        pkgVersionMicro:
          type: string
        pkgVersionPreRelease:
          type: string
        pkgVersionRevision:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        pkgVersionType:
          $ref: "./common.yaml#/components/schemas/pkgVersionType"
    createUserRatingResponseEnvelope:
      type: object
      properties:
        result:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/createUserRatingResult"
        error:
          $ref: "./error.yaml#/components/schemas/error"
    createUserRatingResult:
      type: object
      properties:
        code:
          type: string


    getUserRatingByUserAndPkgVersionRequestEnvelope:
      type: object
      properties:
        repositoryCode:
          type: string
          description: deprecated; use the repositorySourceCode instead
        repositorySourceCode:
          type: string
        userNickname:
          type: string
        pkgName:
          type: string
        pkgVersionArchitectureCode:
          type: string
        pkgVersionMajor:
          type: string
        pkgVersionMinor:
          type: string
        pkgVersionMicro:
          type: string
        pkgVersionPreRelease:
          type: string
        pkgVersionRevision:
          type: integer
          format: int32
    getUserRatingByUserAndPkgVersionResponseEnvelope:
      type: object
      properties:
        result:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/getUserRatingByUserAndPkgVersionResult"
        error:
          $ref: "./error.yaml#/components/schemas/error"
    getUserRatingByUserAndPkgVersionResult:
      type: object
      properties:
        code:
          type: string
        naturalLanguageCode:
          type: string
        user:
          $ref: "./common.yaml#/components/schemas/user"
        userRatingStabilityCode:
          type: string
        active:
          type: boolean
        comment:
          type: string
        modifyTimestamp:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        createTimestamp:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        rating:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        pkgVersion:
          $ref: "./common.yaml#/components/schemas/pkgVersion"


    searchUserRatingsRequestEnvelope:
      allOf:
        - $ref: "./common.yaml#/components/schemas/abstractSearchRequest"
        - type: object
          properties:
            repositoryCode:
              type: string
              description: deprecated; use the repositorySourceCode instead
            repositorySourceCode:
              type: string
            userNickname:
              description: >
                When supplied, will constrain the search to only show user ratings
                that belong to this nominated user.
              type: string
            pkgName:
              type: string
            pkgVersionArchitectureCode:
              type: string
            pkgVersionMajor:
              type: string
            pkgVersionMinor:
              type: string
            pkgVersionMicro:
              type: string
            pkgVersionPreRelease:
              type: string
            pkgVersionRevision:
              type: integer
              format: int32
            daysSinceCreated:
              description: >
                When supplied, will constrain the search to only show user ratings
                that have been created since these many days.
              type: integer
              format: int32
    searchUserRatingsResponseEnvelope:
      type: object
      properties:
        result:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/searchUserRatingsResult"
        error:
          $ref: "./error.yaml#/components/schemas/error"
    searchUserRatingsResult:
      type: object
      properties:
        total:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        items:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              code:
                type: string
              naturalLanguageCode:
                type: string
              userRatingStabilityCode:
                type: string
              active:
                type: boolean
              comment:
                type: string
              modifyTimestamp:
                type: integer
                format: int64
              createTimestamp:
                type: integer
                format: int64
              rating:
                type: integer
                format: int32
              pkgVersion:
                $ref: "./common.yaml#/components/schemas/pkgVersion"
              user:
                $ref: "./common.yaml#/components/schemas/user"

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: /__api/v2/user-rating/create-user-rating: post: operation "createUserRating": requestBody: content: "application/json": parse schema: parse schema: resolve "#/components/schemas/createUserRatingRequestEnvelope": parse schema: property "pkgVersionType": parse schema: resolve "./common.yaml#/components/schemas/pkgVersionType": find schema: external base "./common.yaml" is not supported
